content.raw:
To be clear editing is not linkes to the selected digit it selects the digit just to make things more visible.

I 'm not great with UI stuff so the arrows are probably beyond my skillset. But I like the idea of using the cursor for the selection of significant digits. However I still need to track the left and right arrow to add new zeros.
content.html:
To be clear editing is not linkes to the selected digit it selects the digit just to make things more visible.

I 'm not great with UI stuff so the arrows are probably beyond my skillset. But I like the idea of using the cursor for the selection of significant digits. However I still need to track the left and right arrow to add new zeros.
